name: phaser3-typescript
description: Boilerplate, Game Examples, Cheat Sheets and Tutorials for Phaser 3 in TypeScript

scripts.boilerplate: cd src/boilerplate && yarn install && yarn run dev
scripts.alpha-adjust: cd src/games/alpha-adjust && yarn install && yarn run dev
scripts.asteroid: cd src/games/asteroid && yarn install && yarn run dev
scripts.arcadians: cd src/games/arcadians && yarn install && yarn run dev
scripts.dare-devil-denis: cd src/games/dare-devil-denis && yarn install && yarn run dev
scripts.dungeon: cd src/games/dungeon && yarn install && yarn run dev
scripts.princess: cd src/games/princess && yarn install && yarn run dev
scripts.custom-textures: cd src/experimental/custom-textures && yarn install && yarn run dev
scripts.draw: cd src/experimental/draw && yarn install && yarn run dev
